column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Greg - Thanks for your review. I'm very pleased to know you're a JINYA regular
column2: having been with us since we first showed up in Houston. Your points are succinct and fair
column3: and I'm happy to know we are able to provide you with a level of quality that meets your satisfaction. We wouldn't be where we are today without folks like yourself
column4: so on behalf of my entire staff
column5: I thank you for your support.
